name: Goat Cheese with Zoodles
instructions: Make the zoodles, slice the goat cheese and chop the tomatoes. Fry the zoodles in virgin olive oil for a few minutes. Dish up and enjoy!
instructions-extended:
Health tip: If you want to add good fibres to your meal serve with quinoa or amara (approximately 1dl as dry)

Health tip: The healthiest and tastiest sun-dried tomatoes you can buy from a health shop. They are rich in flavour and aren't soaked in oil that contains no nutrition.
